description: This rich and savoury cauliflower dip is even more addictive than hummus, perfect served with toasted flatbreads.
name: Roasted Cauliflower Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs green olives, pitted and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the cauliflower in a saucepan of boiling water and boil for 5-7 minutes until soft and drain. and add the cauliflower, garlic cloves, anchovies and a tablespoon of olive oil to a roasting tin. Roast for 20 minutes.
Add the cauliflower, garlic cloves, anchovies and a tablespoon of olive oil to a roasting tin. Roast for 15-20 minutes until lightly caramelised.
Place the cauliflower, anchovies, peeled garlic cloves, remaining oil, lemon juice and a pinch of zest and creme fraiche in a food processor and blend for 1-2 minutes to a smooth consistency.
Scoop the dip into a bowl, season with cracked black pepper, scatter with chopped green olives and parsley and serve.
